Home   News   App Center Apps Reviews   Forum   Developers   Community You are here: All Android Apps » Social »Food Finder Add to my profile Add to my watchlist Post on Facebook Link to this app Report comparable or similar apps Developer's website (2,768) Food Finder Michael Quach This app has been removed from the Market. INSTALL About this app: Show more LATEST VERSION 1.4.0 VERSION FROM Dec 5, 2010 UPDATED ON Dec 21, 2010 ANDROID VERSION 1.5 and up CATEGORY Social INSTALLATIONS >250,000 SIZE 183,730 Bytes: PRICE FREE Top 5 Apps Hotel Search HRS-250000 Hotels HRS Hotel Reservation Service (2,335) free AIVC (Alice) YourApp24 (14,610) free SwiftKey 3 Keyboard SwiftKey (62,251) EUR 3.87 AlarmDroid Fabian Lueghausen (27,913) free OfficeSuite Pro 6 + (PDF&HD) Mobile Systems (4,610) EUR 12.56 Overview User reviews (2,768) Review Permissions Description Best Food Finder App! Get turn-by-turn directions to the nearest restaurant of your choice! This handy app helps you find great dining and show you where to eat locally. KW:food,restaurant,food finder,fast food finder,food restaurant finder,fast food restaurant finder,food fast food finder,local restaurant fast food Recent changes: Thank you for using this app. Hope you enjoy it! User Reviews Average rating 4.0 (2,768) Your rating: All reports Market only Community only Language: German English Spanish Russian Portuguese French Italian Turkish All languages   Sort order: Latest first Oldest first alani Dec 23, 2010 12:05:15 PM If anyone is trying to find hot girls or guys in your area check out DroidSingles.Info I meet someone new to hang out with on there every night! Michael Dec 23, 2010 11:10:33 AM Great app. Finds restaurants other apps miss. Thiam Hooi Dec 22, 2010 5:19:19 PM Would be better if the distance is showing in kilometres Bill Dec 21, 2010 9:54:04 PM Fast, specific. Good, potentially great application, but their particular ads suck. I'd rather pay. I still use it, but worst ads on a free app. susie Dec 21, 2010 12:17:58 PM If anyone is try to find hot girls or guys in your area check out DroidSingles.Info I meet someone new to hang out with on there every night! mike Dec 21, 2010 1:49:40 AM Google maps does the same thing. Droid x steve Dec 21, 2010 1:17:12 AM Excellent! kat Dec 14, 2010 6:31:14 PM Nd step by step directions on how to get there. .exit number, etc.. got me lost on my way outta nyc April Dec 14, 2010 6:08:14 PM I'm in arlington, tx and this app can't locate me after 4 min. Dev needs to add ability to enter zipcode. Uninstall. Jacks Dec 11, 2010 3:18:51 AM Good only for big cities. Request a test report now! The application has access to the following: Network communication full Internet access Allows an application to create network sockets. Your location coarse (network-based) location Access coarse location sources such as the cellular network database to determine an approximate phone location, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine approximately where you are. fine (GPS) location Access fine location sources such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are, and may consume additional battery power.
